doc.field: Shr loss 25 cts vs profit three cts Net loss 713,000 vs profit 69,000 Revs 2.4 mln vs 921,000 Six months Shr loss 24 cts vs profit six cts Net loss 572,000 vs profit 120,000 Revs 5.7 mln vs 1.6 mln NOTE:To effect change from fiscal to calendar year, company reported results for six months period ended December 31, 1985. 1985 six months includes one time gain of 35,000 dlrs. Reuter
